data.text: Ao Awurade, mɛfiri mʼakoma nyinaa mu ayi wo ayɛ;
Mede mʼani bɛkyerɛ wʼasɔredan kronkron no, akoto wo
Ɛberɛ a mesu mefrɛɛ wo no, wogyee me so;
Ao Awurade, sɛ ahemfo a ɛwɔ ewiase nyinaa te wʼanomu asɛm a
Ma wɔnto Awurade akwan ho nnwom,
Ɛwom sɛ Awurade wɔ ɔsorosoro deɛ, nanso ɔhwɛ mmɔborɔfoɔ,
Ɛwom sɛ menam ɔhaw mu deɛ,
Awurade bɛma deɛ wahyehyɛ ama me no aba mu;
